article:
Television is one of the major mass media of the United States. Household
ownership is
96.7% [http://www.nytimes.com/2011/05/03/business/media/03television.html
Ownership of TV Sets Falls in U.S., May 3, 2011] and the majority of
households have more than one. Its peak was the 1996-1997 season with 98.4%
ownership. [http://tvbythenumbers.zap2it.com/2007/08/28/us-television-households-by-
season/273/] As a whole, the television networks of the United States are the
largest and most syndicated in the
world. [http://www.fcc.gov/Bureaus/Mass_Media/Factsheets/factvchip.html FCC
V-Chip Fact Sheet, 7/1/99 ]
